pageContent: Purpose of review: The use of MRI in the early detection of prostate cancer (PCa) is increasing rapidly. In the last couple of years, there have been a number of key publications that have led to its adoption in the UK and European guidelines.

metaData.source:
Adverse events of extracorporeal ultrasound-guided high intensity focused ultrasound therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22194777/
